issue.title: world frame not accessible on field in local setup

content.raw:
I found there were two things needed to enable ROS communication across computers:

1. set `ROS_IP` and `ROS_MASTER_URI` correctly: on both the simulator and field computer, it was necessary to set the `ROS_IP` to the ip address of each computer (not `localhost`). Also, I had to set the `ROS_MASTER_URI` to use that same `ROS_IP` instead of localhost (like in [this pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/cloudsim-sim/pull-requests/41/ros-ip-and-master-uri/diff)).

2. open ports: ROS has a single port specified for the master (usually 11311), but for communication between nodes, there is a large range of ports that could be chosen. @tfoote might be able to chime in on which port ranges to open
